item.title: A Note on Variable Types
item.description: A Note on Value Types While working in Lua for Civ VI, you will regularly encounter six types of values: nil, number, string, boolean, function and table.

item.title: About Get-SetProperty
item.description: Get/SetProperty these methods expect an implicit “self” argument. invoke them with : Usage Data Object:GetProperty( Key [string] )
